meanings.definition: A cone-shaped structure, such as a pine cone.
meanings.sent1: The strobilus of the pine tree held many seeds.
meanings.sent2: I found a strobilus on the forest floor during my hike.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel mistook the strobilus for a tasty treat.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts gathered like a strobilus, forming a perfect cone of ideas.
meanings.sent5: The strobilus stood out among the fallen leaves, a natural work of art.

meanings.definition: A reproductive structure in certain plants, consisting of overlapping scales or bracts.
meanings.sent1: The strobilus of the fern plant released spores into the air.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the strobilus to understand plant reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gnome used the strobilus as a tiny umbrella.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter burst out like a strobilus, spreading joy around the garden.
meanings.sent5: The strobilus shimmered in the sunlight, a delicate marvel of nature.
